dtliExcerpt: The musical adaptation of Cameron Crowe's beloved 2000 film about a teenage rock journalist has heart and soul, even if it doesn't quite capture the movie's magic.
bwwExcerpt: Almost everything about "Almost Famous," the Broadway musical adaptation of the Cameron Crowe movie from 2000, feels almost-good-enough. Stage versions of celebrated films are an annual, never-subsiding tide on New York stages, and certainly this production rises above the average by some measure. N...
